title: Shuttle Art Tempera Paint Sticks - 30 Solid Colours - Quick Drying - Works Great on Paper, Wood, Glass, Ceramic, Canvas
features: 30 Various & Brilliant Colours：Shuttle Art Tempera Paint Stick kit contains 30 vivid colours：18 bright classic, 6 luminous metallic and 6 dazzling neon colours. The beautiful and vibrant colours help kids develop creativity on colour exploration.

Easy for use: These paint sticks glide as smooth as silk, the small round barrel is easy for kids to hold. And the twistable body is just like the lipstick and will not break easily. No water and brush needed ,kids just need twist the crayons to raise it up and start painting.

Quick-drying and Washable: Quick-drying formula helps paint to dry in 90 seconds, means no smears and smudges. These paint sticks are washable and can be cleaned with soap water easily ,no longer worry about any paint sticks .
Safe and Non-toxic: Made with environmentally friendly materials, Shuttle Art tempera paint sticks are safe, non toxic, and acid free—perfect for kids, teens and adults.
Satisfaction Guarantee: We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee and perfect service. Take action and get yours now!
